text: <@UDB26738Q> you know, I really don't get how you can be awake 24hours/day -- at least that's how it seems to me... no matter when I try, Mosè is there to merge or comment on my PRs and issue, answer questions, etc.... Are you really two people pretending to be one? :wink: Anyway, much appreciated

text: the trick is to not sleep :slightly_smiling_face:

text: alas, this is a trick beyond my skills... so, good night (morning), folks :wink:

text: There’s a theory that William Shakespeare was actually multiple playwrights that wrote under the same pen name. I feel the same about Mosé

attachments.title: A Rare Gene Mutation Is Associated With Requiring Less Sleep, Researchers Say
attachments.text: Researchers identified a new gene mutation that impacts an individual’s sleep necessity and wakefulness.

text: Chris Rackaukas is another person who answers questions at all hours of the day & night, in addition to all he’s doing with DiffEq, Pumas-AI, SciML, teaching at MIT, preparing for the robotic revolution, etc. etc. etc.
